snippets.snippet: Welcome to Col d'Orcia, organic producer of Brunello.It is the mission of Col d’Orcia to produce the best possible wines that the exceptional combination of soil and climate of this part of Montalcino can achieve.
snippets.title: Wine Brunello di Montalcino - Col d'Orcia

snippets.snippet: After 15 km from Montalcino, at the bottom of the hill, enter the village of S. ANGELO SCALO, on your left, and look for the signs indicating COL D'ORCIA. Directions from Rome 2,5 hours. From Rome take motorway A12 for CIVITAVECCHIA and then continue for 103 km to GROSSETO. Exit at GROSSETO CENTRO and take direction SIENA.
snippets.title: Tuscan Farmhouse Col d'Orcia

snippets.snippet: Benvenuti a Col d'Orcia, produttore biologico di Brunello di Montalcino. Produrre i vini migliori, che dall'eccezionale combinazione del suolo e del clima di questa zona si possono ottenere, è la missione di Col d'Orcia.
snippets.title: Brunello di Montalcino - Vini Col d'Orcia

snippets.snippet: If you have time for just one side trip from Rome, make it Tuscany. Leave the transportation and logistics to someone else on this guided exploration of the Val d’Orcia region. You can simply relax and enjoy a walking tour of Montepulciano, a stop at Sant’Antimo Abbey, along with free time to stroll and shop in UNESCO-listed Pienza.
snippets.title: Col d'Orcia (Montalcino) - 2020 All You Need to Know ...

snippets.snippet: Rødvin Col d'Orcia Brunello di Montalcino 2015. Italia Toscana Brunello di Montalcino. Fint utviklet, preg av røde bær, tørket frukt, fat og mineraler. Lang.
snippets.title: Col d'Orcia Brunello di Montalcino 2015 | Italia | Land ...

snippets.snippet: Om du har tid för bara en resa från Rom, gör det Toscana. Lämna transport och logistik till någon annan på denna guidade utforskning av Val d'Orcia-regionen. Du kan helt enkelt koppla av och njuta av en vandring i Montepulciano, ett stopp vid Sant'Antimo Abbey, tillsammans med ledig tid att promenera och handla på UNESCO-noterade Pienza.

snippets.snippet: During our holidays in Tuscany, we visited the Col d'Orcia winery. We can only say, this is a must visit. We did not announce our visit and despite the fact that they were super busy, they quickly organized a tour through the facilities and production.
